output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in burn function allows the owner to set the total supply to any value.
transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control for 'from' address.
sell function allows attackers to always win the random number game and obtain a large amount of tokens.
Integer overflow in buy function allows a potential trap for the seller, exploited in the buyHeart function.
